thread.title: St Joseph’s, SFS, VT Convent post wins in VHA Inter-School Hockey tournament
thread.title_full: St Joseph’s, SFS, VT Convent post wins in VHA Inter-School Hockey tournament - The Times of India

author: Suhas Nayse
title: St Joseph’s, SFS, VT Convent post wins in VHA Inter-School Hockey tournament
text:
NAGPUR: St Joseph's School, Jaitala, Vimaltai Tidke Convent (VTC), Beltarodi and St Francis de Sales (SFS) launched their campaign on an impressive note in the VHA Inter-School Hockey tournament at the VHA ground here on Thursday.
It was a hard-fought win for St Joseph's, Jaitala as they managed to pip Jaripatka based Vinayala School by a solitary goal. The all-important goal was scored by Ravi Rahile in the second minute of play.
In another match, Vimaltai Tidke Convent rode on Kaustub Baradiya's fine performance as they blanked St Michael's High School 3-0. Baradiya assisted once and scored a goal in his side's first win from Pool D.
In a Pool D match, SFS thrashed St Anthony High School 3-0 to earn three valuable points. Prathamsingh Thakur (21st), Wilson Pillay (31st) and Sandesh Meghani (32nd) were the goal getters for the Sadar based school.
Royal Gondwana Public School earned three points via walkover as South Point School, Omkar Nagar failed to turn up for their Pool A match.
RESULTS
Boys: St Joseph's, Jaitala 1 (Ravi Rahile 2nd) bt Vinalaya School 0. Vimaltai Tidke Convent 3 (Piyush Adamne 14th, Kaustubh Baradiya 16th, Aditya Mariche 39th) St Michael's High School 0. SFS 3 (Prathamsingh Thakur 21st, Wilson Pillay 31st, Sandesh Meghani 32nd) St Anthony High School 0.
On Friday: Boys: Pool D: St Michael's vs St Anthony (8 am); Pool C: School of Scholars vs Vinalaya School (9 am); Pool A: Royal Gondwana vs Dinanath HS (10 am); Pool B: Tidke Vidyalaya vs Jaibai Choudhary (4 pm). Girls: St Paul HS vs Jaibai Choudhary (11 am).
